jobDescription: Our Vision reflects our passion for making a positive difference in the life of children and adults receiving the therapy services as well as in the life of the therapist who provides them.We're seeking Physical Therapy Assistants who are passionate about working in a fast paced environment. You will work directly with our Skilled Nursing Division. We welcome new grads and embrace experienced providers. At Infinite Services, we are dedicated to matching our providers with great opportunities within Skilled Nursing facilities.
